fade-in

Wait for it ...

fly-in-left + fade-in

twirl-in

fly-in-left

fly-in-right

fly-in-top

fly-in-bottom

rotate-in-left

rotate-in-right

whoosh-in-right

pan-up

sections.doc_:
## Introduction

AMP Stories support animations out-of-the-box.  Every element inside an `amp-story-page` can define an entrance animation. You can find a list of all supported animations [here](/amp-dev/documentation/components/reference/amp-story.md#animations).
sections.cachedMarkedDoc:
Introduction

AMP Stories support animations out-of-the-box. Every element inside an amp-story-page can define an entrance animation. You can find a list of all supported animations here.
sections.normalizedDoc_:
## Introduction

AMP Stories support animations out-of-the-box.  Every element inside an `amp-story-page` can define an entrance animation. You can find a list of all supported animations [here](/amp-dev/documentation/components/reference/amp-story.md#animations).

sections.code:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html amp>
<head>
  <meta charset="utf-8">
  <title>AMP Story Animations</title>
  <link rel="canonical" href="http://localhost:8080/documentation/examples/visual-effects/amp_story_animations/index.html">
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width,minimum-scale=1,initial-scale=1">
  <script async custom-element="amp-story" src="https://cdn.ampproject.org/v0/amp-story-1.0.js"></script>
  <style amp-boilerplate>body{-webkit-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;-moz-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;-ms-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both}@-webkit-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-moz-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-ms-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-o-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}</style><noscript><style amp-boilerplate>body{-webkit-animation:none;-moz-animation:none;-ms-animation:none;animation:none}</style></noscript>
  <script async src="https://cdn.ampproject.org/v0.js"></script>
  <style amp-custom>
    :root {
      --color-primary: #005AF0;
      --color-text-light: #fff;
    }
    amp-story-page {
      font-family: 'Roboto', sans-serif;
      background: var(--color-text-light);
    }
    amp-story-grid-layer {
      align-items: center;
      justify-items: center;
    }
    .square,
    .circle {
      background: var(--color-primary);
      width: 96px;
      height: 96px;
    }
    .circle {
      border-radius: 80px;
    }
    </style>
</head>
<body>
  <amp-story standalone
    title="Stories in AMP - Animations"
    publisher="AMP Project"
    publisher-logo-src="http://localhost:8080/favicons/coast-228x228.png"
    poster-portrait-src="https://picsum.photos/300/400"
    poster-square-src="https://picsum.photos/300/300"
    poster-landscape-src="https://picsum.photos/400/300">
sections.preview:
<amp-story standalone
    title="Stories in AMP - Animations"
    publisher="AMP Project"
    publisher-logo-src="http://localhost:8080/favicons/coast-228x228.png"
    poster-portrait-src="https://picsum.photos/300/400"
    poster-square-src="https://picsum.photos/300/300"
    poster-landscape-src="https://picsum.photos/400/300">

sections.doc_: All animations can be can be customized using the `animate-in-duration` and `animate-in-delay` properties.
sections.code: Wait for it ...
sections.preview: Wait for it ...
sections.normalizedDoc_: All animations can be can be customized using the `animate-in-duration` and `animate-in-delay` properties.

sections.doc_: Use the `animate-in-duration` and `animate-in-delay` properties to customize the entry animations.
sections.code:
<amp-story-page id="sequence">
  <amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical">
    <amp-img id="image1"
      animate-in="fade-in"
      animate-in-delay="1s"
      animate-in-duration="1s"
      src="https://unsplash.it/720/320/?image=10"
      width="720"
      height="320"
      layout="responsive"></amp-img>
    <amp-img id="image2"
      animate-in="fade-in"
      animate-in-duration="1s"
      animate-in-delay="0.25s"
      animate-in-after="image1"
      src="https://unsplash.it/720/320/?image=11"
      width="720"
      height="320"
      layout="responsive"></amp-img>
    <amp-img id="image3"
      animate-in="fade-in"
      animate-in-duration="1s"
      animate-in-delay="0.25s"
      animate-in-after="image2"
      src="https://unsplash.it/720/320/?image=12"
      width="720"
      height="320"
      layout="responsive"></amp-img>
    <amp-img id="image4"
      animate-in="fade-in"
      animate-in-duration="1s"
      animate-in-delay="0.25s"
      animate-in-after="image3"
      src="https://unsplash.it/720/320/?image=13"
      width="720"
      height="320"
      layout="responsive"></amp-img>
  </amp-story-grid-layer>
</amp-story-page>
sections.preview:
<amp-story-page id="sequence">
      <amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical">
        <amp-img id="image1"
          animate-in="fade-in"
          animate-in-delay="1s"
          animate-in-duration="1s"
          src="https://unsplash.it/720/320/?image=10"
          width="720"
          height="320"
          layout="responsive"></amp-img>
        <amp-img id="image2"
          animate-in="fade-in"
          animate-in-duration="1s"
          animate-in-delay="0.25s"
          animate-in-after="image1"
          src="https://unsplash.it/720/320/?image=11"
          width="720"
          height="320"
          layout="responsive"></amp-img>
        <amp-img id="image3"
          animate-in="fade-in"
          animate-in-duration="1s"
          animate-in-delay="0.25s"
          animate-in-after="image2"
          src="https://unsplash.it/720/320/?image=12"
          width="720"
          height="320"
          layout="responsive"></amp-img>
        <amp-img id="image4"
          animate-in="fade-in"
          animate-in-duration="1s"
          animate-in-delay="0.25s"
          animate-in-after="image3"
          src="https://unsplash.it/720/320/?image=13"
          width="720"
          height="320"
          layout="responsive"></amp-img>
      </amp-story-grid-layer>
    </amp-story-page>
sections.normalizedDoc_: Use the `animate-in-duration` and `animate-in-delay` properties to customize the entry animations.

sections.doc_: You can combine multiple animations by nesting them into multiple elements.
sections.code: fly-in-left + fade-in
sections.preview: fly-in-left + fade-in
sections.normalizedDoc_: You can combine multiple animations by nesting them into multiple elements.

sections.doc_: Animations can use a twirl-in effect.
sections.normalizedDoc_: Animations can use a twirl-in effect.

sections.doc_: You can also use animations on images to create visual effects.

sections.doc_: Tip: Create a Ken Burns effect by combining these! Learn how in the visual effects section.

document.head:
<meta charset="utf-8">
  <title>AMP Story Animations</title>
  <link rel="canonical" href="http://localhost:8080/documentation/examples/visual-effects/amp_story_animations/index.html">
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width,minimum-scale=1,initial-scale=1">
  
  <style amp-boilerplate>body{-webkit-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;-moz-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;-ms-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both}@-webkit-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-moz-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-ms-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-o-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}</style><noscript><style amp-boilerplate>body{-webkit-animation:none;-moz-animation:none;-ms-animation:none;animation:none}</style></noscript>
  <script async src="https://cdn.ampproject.org/v0.js"></script>
